column5: I see some big ponds on either side of the road out highway 90 between Barrie and Angus.  Anyone know if there is any fish in them?
No fish, just gravel pits, although there are some whales in there in the summer.

hahaha I have seen some people over there before...wasn't too pretty.  does that mean they are quite deep? They actually look pretty shallow and flat.  Would be a shame if a bass or two found their way in there  :rolleyes:
There's Pike in the one on the right if your heading from barrie to angus.   Nothing huge, but still some decent numbers! great place to trap some minnows !
